welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Orkelljunga, a charming city in the heart of Sweden known for its beautiful landscapes and charming small town atmosphere. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Angelholm Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Angelholm Airport is used for transporting goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
